content: Think Progress uses the term “white nationalist” to describe anyone they disagree with. Richard Spencer, who actually is a white nationalist and is an acquaintance of Miller, says that Miller is not a white nationalist. The term “alt-right” is so loosely used by leftist publications that it has almost no meaning. A better description of Miller would be “cultural nationalist,” that is, someone who believes that Western civilization is a superior culture and worth preserving. That does not imply racism — unless you agree with the “race realists” that culture is genetically determined. Nor does it imply Christian supremacy. Miller is a practicing Jew. Think Progress is too concerned at pasting derogatory labels on their political opponents and not concerned with advancing public understanding.
